title: An Effigy's health is determined by the game mode:
text:
Skirmish 3v3 = 16 health Battle 5v5 = 20 health

- y Reduced by 4 each time a Soul becomes Bound to an enemy Hero (the damage is only permanent if the Soul is subsequently Banked ).

- y Increased by 4 each time an enemyBound Soul becomes unbound and/or lost.
